title: Isekai Tensei no Boukensha - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adventurers   Alchemy   Beast Companions   Beastkin   Cheats   Death of Loved Ones   Depictions of Cruelty   Divine Protection   Dungeons   Gods   Golems   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monster Tamer   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   S*aves   Time Skip
author: Kenichi   ケンイチ
description: Ootori Tenma, who lost his parents and was raised by his grandfather’s and grandmother’s friends who are living in the countryside, loses his life at the age of 25. A god of a different world called out to the ghost Tenma. This is a story about Tenma who, is liked by multiple Gods of reincarnation, receives multiple cheats and lives a second life in another world.>
